column4: ever synce I have switched to lucid, I have managed to get skype into a funny state where I can't evem 'sudo killall skype' .. processes keep running.. is there a bigger hammer ?
there are a number of kill options in htop..
other than that you can ps -e to find the pid no. and then kill 9 pid
I think the killall would send a sigterm signal...whereas you might need a less graceful sigkill signal to stamp it out
seems so... the kill -9 seems to have done the trick .. many thanks
htop has kill options as well..both sigterm and sigkill
I see are you saying one of those is equivalent to -9 ?
ok .. always something to learn :-) thanks for for the tips
sigterm allows the app to exit gracefully...sigkill just kills it with potential for dataloss etc..
